Twelue prophetical legacies. Or Twelue sermons vpon Iacobs last will and testament recorded by Moses, in the 49. chapt. of Genesis: containing his bequests and blessings, bestowed vpon his twelue sonnes. ... Preached by Francis Rollenson, Bach: of Diuinitie, and sometimes fellow of S. Iohn the Euang: Colledge in Cambridge. Rollenson, Francis, ca. 1565-1630.
[6], 287, [1] p.
Imprinted by T[homas] C[reede] for Arthur Iohnson, dwelling at the signe of the white horse, by the great north doore of Paules, London : 1612.
Printer's name from STC. Errata, 2N4v. Variant: lacking errata. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
